events.message: The candidate submitted their application for the software engineer position with a detailed resume and cover letter highlighting relevant experience.
The application was reviewed and categorized under the Engineering cluster based on keywords such as software engineer and developer.
A recruiter specializing in engineering roles was assigned to manage the candidate's recruitment journey and follow up on next steps.
The recruiter conducted an initial phone screening to discuss the candidate's current skills, experience, and motivation for the software developer role.
The candidate responded enthusiastically to the screening questions and expressed strong interest in proceeding to technical interviews.
The technical interview was scheduled for the following week to assess the candidate's coding skills and problem-solving ability in a live environment.
The candidate successfully completed the technical interview, demonstrating strong knowledge in software development and good problem-solving techniques.
Following the technical round, an HR interview was scheduled to discuss cultural fit, compensation expectations, and onboarding details.
